question: What is the main goal for your project today?
What blockers are currently slowing down your progress?
What feature or function are you focusing on implementing next?
Is there any refactoring you’ve been putting off?
What technical debt is building up?
What decisions are you waiting on from others?
What test coverage are you aiming to improve?
What tools or libraries are helping you the most today?
Is there anything you want to try differently tomorrow?
What’s one insight or lesson from today’s work?
